entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 04:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
